name: pump-bot
description: A simple bot that helps to take profit in organized pump events for cryptos.

scripts.release: yarn release:linux && yarn release:mac && yarn release:win
scripts.release:linux: pkg package.json --output build/pump-bot-linux-x64 -t node12-linux-x64 && bestzip build/pump-bot-linux-x64.zip build/pump-bot-linux-x64
scripts.release:mac: pkg package.json --output build/pump-bot-macos-x64 -t node12-macos-x64 && bestzip build/pump-bot-macos-x64.zip build/pump-bot-macos-x64
scripts.release:win: pkg package.json --output build/pump-bot-win-x64.exe -t node12-win-x64 && bestzip build/pump-bot-win-x64.zip build/pump-bot-win-x64

author: Andrea Valla <valla.andrea@gmail.com>
